description.value:
Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hunt Prey] and select only one prey, you can grant your Hunt Prey benefits and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Hunter's Edge] to an ally in addition to gaining them yourself. The ally retains these benefits until you use Hunt Prey again.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision]
